object.name: EvtsBeforeFilters
object.description: Rate of evts before any filter (computed using MeritTuple->EvtEventId)

object.name: EvtsBeforeCuts
object.description: Rate of events before applicaltion of cuts.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsWithGAMMAFilter
object.description: Rate of events before applicaltion of cuts that survive the Gleam GAMMA filter

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsWithFswGAMMAFilter
object.description: Rate of events before applicaltion of cuts that survive the Flight Software GAMMA filter

object.name: EvtsBeforeCuts_E100MeV
object.description: Rate of events with FT1Energy above 100 MeV, before applicaltion of cuts.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsBelow60ZenithTheta
object.description: Rate of events before application of gamma selection cuts that survive the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 60.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsBelow100ZenithTheta
object.description: Rate of events before application of gamma selection cuts that survive the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 100.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsBelow60ZenithTheta_E100MeV
object.description: Rate of events before application of gamma selection cuts that survive the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 60 and FT1Energy larger than 100 MeV.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsBelow100ZenithTheta_E100MeV
object.description: Rate of events before application of gamma selection cuts that survive the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 100 and FT1Energy larger than 100 MeV.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsAbove60ZenithTheta
object.description: Rate of events before application of gamma selection cuts that survive the cut FT1ZenithTheta larger than 60.

object.name: EvtsBeforeCutsAbove100ZenithTheta
object.description: Rate of events before application of gamma selection cuts that survive the cut FT1ZenithTheta larger than 100.

object.name: TransientEvts
object.description: Rate of events after application of TRANSIENT gamma cuts from pass5.

object.name: TransientEvts_E100MeV
object.description: Rate of events with FT1Energy above 100 MeV, after application of TRANSIENT gamma cuts from pass5.

object.name: DiffuseEvts
object.description: Rate of events after application of DIFFUSE gamma cuts from pass5.

object.name: DiffuseEvts_E100MeV
object.description: Rate of events with FT1Energy above 100 MeV, after application of DIFFUSE gamma cuts from pass5.

object.name: SourceEvts
object.description: Rate of events after application of SOURCE gamma cuts from pass5.

object.name: SourceEvts_E100MeV
object.description: Rate of events with FT1Energy above 100 MeV, after application of SOURCE gamma cuts from pass5.

object.name: TransientEvtsBelowZenithTheta60_E100MeV
object.cut: (FswFilters[0]>0) && CTBBestEnergyProb>0. && CTBCORE>0. && CTBBestEnergy>10 && CTBBestEnergyRatio<5 && (CTBClassLevel>0) && FT1ZenithTheta<60 && FT1Energy>100
object.description: Rate of events after application of TRANSIENT gamma cuts from pass5 and the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 60 and FT1Energy above 100 MeV.

object.name: DiffuseEvtsBelowZenithTheta60_E100MeV
object.cut: (FswFilters[0]>0) && CTBBestEnergyProb>0.1 && CTBCORE>0.1 && CTBBestEnergy>10 && CTBBestEnergyRatio<5 && (CTBClassLevel>2) && FT1ZenithTheta<60 && FT1Energy>100
object.description: Rate of events after application of DIFFUSE gamma cuts from pass5 and the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 60 and FT1Energy above 100 MeV.

object.name: SourceEvtsBelowZenithTheta60_E100MeV
object.cut: (FswFilters[0]>0) && CTBBestEnergyProb>0.1 && CTBCORE>0.1 && CTBBestEnergy>10 && CTBBestEnergyRatio<5 && (CTBClassLevel>1) && FT1ZenithTheta<60 && FT1Energy>100
object.description: Rate of events after application of SOURCE gamma cuts from pass5 and the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 60 and FT1Energy above 100 MeV.

object.name: TransientEvtsBelowZenithTheta100_E100MeV
object.cut: (FswFilters[0]>0) && CTBBestEnergyProb>0. && CTBCORE>0. && CTBBestEnergy>10 && CTBBestEnergyRatio<5 && (CTBClassLevel>0) && FT1ZenithTheta<100 && FT1Energy>100
object.description: Rate of events after application of TRANSIENT gamma cuts from pass5 and the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 100 and FT1Energy above 100 MeV.

object.name: DiffuseEvtsBelowZenithTheta100_E100MeV
object.cut: (FswFilters[0]>0) && CTBBestEnergyProb>0.1 && CTBCORE>0.1 && CTBBestEnergy>10 && CTBBestEnergyRatio<5 && (CTBClassLevel>2) && FT1ZenithTheta<100 && FT1Energy>100
object.description: Rate of events after application of DIFFUSE gamma cuts from pass5 and the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 100 and FT1Energy above 100 MeV.

object.name: SourceEvtsBelowZenithTheta100_E100MeV
object.cut: (FswFilters[0]>0) && CTBBestEnergyProb>0.1 && CTBCORE>0.1 && CTBBestEnergy>10 && CTBBestEnergyRatio<5 && (CTBClassLevel>1) && FT1ZenithTheta<100 && FT1Energy>100
object.description: Rate of events after application of SOURCE gamma cuts from pass5 and the cut FT1ZenithTheta smaller than 100 and FT1Energy above 100 MeV.

object.name: GAMMAFilterAndTriggerEngine[16]
object.description: Rate of Trigger Engines (DigiEvent->getL1T().getGemEngine()) passing the Gleam GAMMA filter

object.name: FswGAMMAFilterAndTriggerEngine[16]
object.description: Rate of Trigger Engines (DigiEvent->getL1T().getGemEngine()) passing the Gleam GAMMA filter

object.name: Correlation_RateEvtsBeforeFilters_McIlwainL_TH2
object.titledesc: Correlation Rate Before Filters with McIlwainL
object.description: Correlation Rate Before Filters with the magnetic parameter McIlwainL.

object.name: Correlation_RateEvtsBeforeCuts_McIlwainL_TH2
object.titledesc: Correlation Rate Before Cuts with McIlwainL
object.description: Correlation Rate Before cuts (i.e. rate of events written to disk) with the magnetic parameter McIlwainL.

object.name: Correlation_RateEvtsBeforeFilters_RigidityCutoff_TH2
object.titledesc: Correlation Rate Before Filters with RigidityCutoff
object.description: Correlation Rate Before Filters with the magnetic parameter RigidityCutoff.

object.name: Correlation_RateEvtsBeforeCuts_RigidityCutoff_TH2
object.titledesc: Correlation Rate Before Cuts with RigidityCutoff
object.description: Correlation Rate Before cuts (i.e. rate of events written to disk) with the magnetic parameter RigidityCutoff.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateEvtsBeforeFilters_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of EvtsBeforeFilters. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateEvtsBeforeCuts_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of EvtsBeforeCuts. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateEvtsBeforeCutsWithGAMMAFilter_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of EvtsBeforeCuts that survive the Gleam GAMMA filter. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateEvtsBeforeCutsWithFswGAMMAFilter_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of EvtsBeforeCuts that survive the Flight Software GAMMA filter. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateTransientEvts_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of TransientEvts. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateDiffuseEvts_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of DiffuseEvts. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateSourceEvts_TH1
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of SourceEvts. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateTriggerEngine_TH1_TriggerEngine[16]
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of the different trigger engines. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateGAMMAFilterAndTriggerEngine_TH1_TriggerEngine[16]
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of the different trigger engines (DigiEvent->getL1T().getGemEngine()) that survive the Gleam GAMMA filter. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: DeviationFromOneInSigmas_NormRateFswGAMMAFilterAndTriggerEngine_TH1_TriggerEngine[16]
object.description: Distribution of deviations from the 1.0 (which should be the mean of the normalized rate, if normalization is successful) for the normalized rate of the different trigger engines (DigiEvent->getL1T().getGemEngine()) that survive the Flight Software GAMMA filter. The Normalization is done according to the value of PtMcIlwainL. The deviations are measured in sigmas, that is in error bars of the normalized rates.

object.name: AcdActDistTileEnergy_Log10_TH1
object.description: Distribution of log10(AcdActDistTileEnergy) values. Only positive values of AcdActDistTileEnergy are being used.

object.name: Tkr1LATEdge_ZOOM_TH1
object.description: Distribution of Tkr1LATEdge values. Only values in range 0-500 are displayed

object.name: Tkr1KalEne_Log10_TH1
object.description: Distribution of Log10(Tkr1KalEne) values. Values up to 5000000 MeV are being displayed.

object.name: Tkr1KalEne_Zoom_TH1
object.description: Distribution of Tkr1KalEne values. Values up to 5000 MeV are being displayed.

object.name: Tkr1KalThetaMS_TH1
object.description: Distribution of Tkr1KalThetaMS values. Values up to 5.0 rad are being displayed.

object.name: Tkr1KalThetaMS_Zoom_TH1
object.description: Distribution of Tkr1KalThetaMS values. Values up to 0.1 rad are being displayed.

object.name: CalTransRms_Zoom_TH1
object.description: Distribution of CalTransRms values. Only values in range 0-50 are displayed.

object.name: CTBParticleType_TH1
object.description: Distribution of CTBParticleType values. -1 = initialized value, 0 = CTBClassLevel larger or equal than 1 (that is photon candidate), 1 = e+/e-, 2 = proton, 3 = alpha, and 4 = heavy ion
